idea-plugin.name: SQL String to List
idea-plugin.description:
This is useful when a SQL query returns a comma-separated string of text and you need to use the result in another query.

Example:
abc,def,ghi
 becomes 
'abc','def','ghi'
.
    

The secondary option places each string on a new line.

action.description: Splits a String at comma(s), then surrounds each with single quotes.

action.text: String to List with New Line
